title: Ezra1122
author: Ezra1122
content: We need an experienced bounty manager to manage our bounty campaign. This role is involved in the day to day operations of Bounty program.Skills : - Community management- Bounty Programs (management or as a researcher)Duties:- help us creating bounty campaign- monitor and verify compliance- keep track of rewardsPlease leave your telegram id in comment or direct message. We will look on your profile and select direclty.Thank you!

comments.author: Solayman3
comments.body: Only bounty detective is real manager

This role is involved in the day to day operations of Bounty program.Skills : - Community management- Bounty Programs (management or as a researcher)Duties:- help us creating bounty campaign- monitor and verify compliance- keep track of rewardsPlease leave your telegram id in comment or direct message. We will look on your profile and select direclty.Thank you!I think you should visit service board and you will see reputatable bounty managers that can manage your bounty campaign. I will be recommending you to contact CryptopreneurBrainboss, yahoo62278 and julerz12. Those are some reputable bounty managers in the forum that can manage your bounty and all of them are reputable member of the forum.

This role is involved in the day to day operations of Bounty program.Skills : - Community management- Bounty Programs (management or as a researcher)Duties:- help us creating bounty campaign- monitor and verify compliance- keep track of rewardsPlease leave your telegram id in comment or direct message. But if your campaign is btc paying type then find yourself in the service section for variety
